remarks: Composition of two functions expressed as mapping abstractions. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
fmptcof.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. A R e. B ) $.
fmptcof.2 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> R ) ) $.
fmptcof.3 $e |- ( ph -> G = ( y e. B |-> S ) ) $.
fmptcos $p |- ( ph -> ( G o. F ) = ( x e. A |-> [_ R / y ]_ S ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d R y $.
$d S x $.
